Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory154.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Watanabe-San! The remaining Corrupted have been disposed of!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe gives a nod and looks at the Akdilek entourage. Smiling, Jamilah waves back at him.'}
{3: "Sophia stays at her side. She didn't seem to have moved at all. With not a single Corrupted form next to her, the Forsaken seem to have won the bout."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'What is the meaning of this, Akdilek?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "It's nothing. The boss merely told us not to engage.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pulao', 3: 'Then according to our agreement, all three containers now belong to the Forsaken!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'All aboard the ship let out a joyful cry, as if this was the climax to the performance they had been waiting for.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Wait, three containers? We had a deal for just one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Miss Pulao specifically said "all of the cargo", did she not? You all heard it. Or do the Forsaken habitually forsake their agreements?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "This ain't good, Watanabe-San. We still taking the cargo? We can't transport so much!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe closes his eyes with a sigh. Jamilah and her band of jackals noticed this in advance. That's why they let the cargo go uncontested."}

{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Sophia, it seems our Forsaken friends have run into a logistical pickle. Seeing as we are all comrades abandoned on this Earth, shouldn't the Akdeliks lend them a hand?", 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'The Akdilek Commercial Alliance has fleets of medium to heavy transport vehicles, capable of safely handling long-haul logistics across any terrain, at a reasonable price.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Hmph, this was all part of your plan, wasn't it... Forget it. Let this be a lesson for us.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "Huh? What's that mean, Watanabe-San?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Sigh... we wish to engage the Akdileks' transportation service. When can you depart?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Thank you for your patronage. We are ready to depart whenever you're ready... Changyu, you will lead the convoy and escort the cargo.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The silent, gawking black-haired adolescent jumps at the mention of his name, bewildered.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Me? Wait, why me?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Sophia and I have trading partners to seek out here, and you'll be of no use in that.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Hey, is this kid really up to the task?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Of course. He is a force to be reckoned with among the Akdileks. Best not to underestimate him.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Huh, just as well, I want off this boat anyway.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'So, Changyu, would you please escort the Forsaken to their cargo?', 4: '1'}
{3: "As Jamilah waves goodbye to Changyu's group, Sophia finally asks the question that's been on her mind."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Boss, why did you specifically ask Changyu to escort them?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Jamilah gazes at the departing Watanabe, accompanied by Changyu, and a smile creeps onto her face.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'Maybe... I just felt like it.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: '...so, can I trust you with this?'}
{2: 'Why the Gray Raven?', 3: '64'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'You should find it hard to refuse, what with us being good acquaintances and all.'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: 'I kid... but I feel that the members of your team, that kid included, could use a little trip to get used to your new changes.'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "I think that it is an excellent suggestion. Don't you?"}
{2: "...I'll consider it.", 3: '69'}
{2: 'Jamilah', 3: "Hoho, I think you'll thank me for it—Commandant."}
